items.sentence: Tom looks at the world through rose-tinted glasses.
I doubt if Tom would be willing to stop doing that.
I don\'t have enough cookies to give everybody one.
What makes you think Tom hasn\'t done that already?
What\'s Tom doing here? I thought he was in Boston.
Are you just going to sit here and not do anything?
Tom told himself that there was no reason to panic.
Put on a coat. If you don\'t, you\'ll catch a cold.
Tom is a young French teacher fresh out of college.
Tom is carrying a bag containing a million dollars.
